mapper.select: select rownum r, xxx.* from ( select * from ( select g.gname,nvl(x.gsum,0) gsum from custgrade g, (select count(1) gsum ,c.gid gid from customer c group by c.gid ) x where x.gid(+)=g.gid ) xx order by xx.gsum desc) xxx
select x.*,rownum r from ( select t.servicetyle,count(1) sss from SERVICE t group by t.servicetyle order by sss )x

select * from ( select x.*,rownum r from ( select c.cname,dd.sumprice from customer c, (select d.custid ids,sum(d.sumprice) sumprice from orders d group by d.custid ) dd where c.custid=dd.ids(+) order by dd.sumprice) x) where r>(#{page}-1)*#{pageSize} and r<=#{page}*#{pageSize}
select count(1) from customer c, (select d.custid ids,sum(d.sumprice) sumprice from orders d group by d.custid ) dd where c.custid=dd.ids(+)
